data.proxyObjectName: plastic spray bottle with blue liquid
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the narrow neck beneath the trigger and swing so the filled bottle base strikes downward like a hammerhead
Enclose the cylinder in your palm like a handle and swing your forearm in diagonal and vertical cuts

data.proxyObjectName: telescoping stainless steel rod with black digital display handle
data.utilizationMethod: Wrap the hand around the black cylindrical handle and move the entire rod forward and backward along the desk while keeping the handle level

data.proxyObjectName: white handheld pencil sharpener with residue visible inside
data.utilizationMethod: Set the sharpener flat on the desk, press the top plastic lid directly downward with the index finger and release (not sure whether it is applicable)

data.proxyObjectName: small hand broom with wooden handle and black bristles
data.utilizationMethod: Hold the wooden handle and press the tip ends of the stiff bristles directly onto the skin of the palm
